info: Initial default theme configuration whilst migrating from default ttk OS widgets

info.info1: The 'group_panel' section are any section which contains items for user input, such as the left hand options panel in the main GUI or the Settings pop-up
info.info2: Anything which uses a 'group_panel' will use the theme specified here as default. Panels can be overriden (see below).
info.panel_background: The background color of the main panel that holds all of the group options.
info.info_color: The background color of the information header box at the top of each control panel
info.info_font: The color of the font inside the information header box at the top of each control panel
info.info_border: The color of the border around the outside of the information header box at the top of each control panel
info.header_color: The color to use for the option group boxes header backgrounds, the group box border and for labels on options groups.
info.header_font: The color to use for the option group boxes header font.
info.group_background: This is the color used for the background of each group of options, as well as the background color used for any label which resides inside a group box
info.group_font: The font color used inside each group box for labels
info.control_color: The color of controls (e.g. Slider knob, combo pull-down arrow, scrollbar slider + arrows etc.)
info.control_active: Selected/hovered over color of controls (e.g. Slider knob, combo pull-down arrow, scrollbar slider + arrows etc.)
info.control_disabled: The color of controls when they are disabled (specifically scrollbars when there is no page to scroll).
info.input_color: The background color of input boxes (e.g. text entry)
info.input_font: The font color of input boxes (e.g. text entry)

info.info1: Override default colors for the settings pop-up. See 'group_panel' for allowable options
info.info2: Options same as 'group_panel' with the following additions:
info.tree_select: The color of the selected item in the left hand nav frame
info.link_color: The color of links on pages where there are no configuration options

info.info1: The colors of the console output box
info.background_color: The background color of the console output
info.border_color: The color of the border around the console box and scrollbar
info.stdout_color: The text color for standard print message output (non Faceswap Logging messages)
info.stderr_color: The text color for messages that are printed to sterr (non Faceswap Logging messages)
info.info_color: The text color for Faceswap INFO log messages
info.verbose_color: The text color for Faceswap VERBOSE log messages
info.warning_color: The text color for Faceswap WARNING log messages
info.critical_color: The text color for Faceswap CRITICAL log messages
info.error_color: The text color for Faceswap ERROR log messages
info.scrollbar_border: The color of the overall scrollbar border
info.scrollbar_trough: The color of the scrollbar trough
info.scrollbar_background_<state>: The main color of the up/down buttons and the slider of the scrollbar, for active (pressed/hovered), normal and disabled (no scrollbar required)
info.scrollbar_foreground_<state>: The foreground color for the up/down buttons of the scrollbar, for active (pressed/hovered), normal and disabled (no scrollbar required)
info.scrollbar_border_<state>: The border color of the up/down buttons and the slider of the scrollbar, for active (pressed/hovered), normal and disabled (no scrollbar required)

info.info1: The colors of the tool-tip pop ups
